text: Muham'mada allahara rasula ebam tamra sahacaragana kapheradera prati kathora, nijedera madhye paraspara sahanubhutisila. Allahara anugraha o santusti kamanaya apani taderake ruku o sejadarata dekhabena. Tadera mukhamandale rayeche sejadara cihna. Ta'orate tadera abastha erupa ebam injile tadera abastha yemana ekati cara gacha ya theke nirgata haya kisalaya, atahpara ta sakta o majabuta haya ebam kandera upara damraya drrhabhabe-casike anande abhibhuta kare-yate allaha tadera dbara kapheradera antarjala srsti karena. Tadera madhye yara bisbasa sthapana kare ebam satkarma kare, allaha taderake ksama o mahapuraskarera oyada diyechena.
